post.summary: A discount code can only be blocked and reserverd via API => A code is only redeemed once a contract is created (System procedure, not API call)
Returns a list of all contracts of this user.
Returns the total savings for a given contract. (Will be removed as soon as the frontend switched to metrics-v2)
Returns the metrics for a given contract. (Will be removed as soon as the frontend switched to metrics-v2)
Returns the metrics for a given contract.

Return the list of contract's documents of the given CustomerFileDocumentType defined in request
If document type is null returns prepayments and settlements
Return the list of contractDraft's documents of the given CustomerFileDocumentType defined in request
Returns the hourly day-ahead prices (for a limited time-period).

get.summary: Streamed download for a file with given fileId, if not found response status code is 404

post.summary: Return the list of customer's documents of the given CustomerFileDocumentType defined in request
Returns a list of all available parameters

stateOfCharge.description: State of Charge as decimal Fraction

ApiContractMetricValueType.description:
Members:

  • actual - Always return actual data only
  • forecast - Always return forecast data only
  • dynamic - Dynamically returns actual OR forecast data (never mixed) based on backend decision.
  • combined - Combine forecast values and actual values. Show actual values instead of forecast values for a specific moment if available.

contractNumber.description: Fetches only codes that have been reserved / redeemed for the specified contract number (Whether it is only a contractDraft or already a full contract)
If set fetches only codes that have been reserved / redeemed for the specified contract number (Whether it is only a contractDraft or already a full contract)

validityTime.description: Describes a custom validity time. If not set then the current time is used.
Describes a custom validity time. If not set then the current time is used.

forUser.description: Wenn true, dann kann diese Nachricht einem Benutzer angezeigt werden.

offset.description: Ergebnisse werden erst aber dieser Position zurück geben.

ApiQueryRange.description:
Gebe ab Position (Rabot.Prosumer.WebApi.Models.ApiQueryRange.Offset) Anzahl (Rabot.Prosumer.WebApi.Models.ApiQueryRange.Limit) Ergebnisse zurück,
im Zeitbereich Rabot.Prosumer.WebApi.Models.ApiQueryRange.From - Rabot.Prosumer.WebApi.Models.ApiQueryRange.To.
Alle Felder sind optional.

ApiReserveDiscountCodeRequest.description: You can provide either the DraftId or the ContractId, both is equally valid (and in the web funnel a contract might not exist yet)

suppressHttpError400.description:
If true, Bad Request Error 400 will returned as 200. Success will be still false.
Useful, if you need to supress those errors in the browser console.

Bearer.description:
Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 

 Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer 67AD939A-E63C-42BD-A76A-7FB28A5E244A"
Bearer.name: Authorization
